item.title: The Last Time Qualcomm’s RSI Did This, the Stock Rallied 70%
item.description: Qualcomm has just exited extremely oversold territory, a signal that previously preceded a major rally - could history be about to repeat itself?

item.title: 3 Robotics Stocks Animating Markets With Ample Upside to Go
item.description: Robotics stocks are on fire in early 2026, underpinned by increased defense spending and sell-side interest. Analysts and institutions accumulate.

item.title: Why These 3 Uranium ETFs Could Be 2026’s Most Overlooked Winners
item.description: Uranium demand and limited supply could send shares of companies held by these ETFs skyward in 2026, making them an easy way to gain broad exposure.

item.title: Washington’s $1.6B Endorsement Turns USA Rare Earth Into a Force
item.description: A government funding package for USA Rare Earth creates a new national champion for heavy critical minerals while reshaping the domestic mining sector...

item.title: Pelosi’s Bullish 2026 Buy List: AI, Power & Dividends
